## My Favorite plot

```{r, echo=FALSE}

if (!"palmerpenguins" %in% installed.packages()) {
  remotes::install_github("allisonhorst/palmerpenguins")
}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)


ggplot(penguins, aes(x = body_mass_g, y = bill_length_mm, color = species)) +
  geom_point()


```
